functions.name: deep_space_to_point_cloud
functions.docstring:
Convert a deep space image to a point cloud for negative space analysis.

This version is optimized for astronomical images, detecting bright objects
against the dark background of space and generating 3D points based on
brightness and position.

Args:
    image_path: Path to the deep space image file
    
Returns:
    NegativeSpacePointCloud object with points generated from the image

functions.name: visualize_point_cloud_2d_projections
functions.docstring:
Create a customized 2D visualization of the deep space point cloud.

Args:
    point_cloud: The point cloud to visualize
    output_path: Path to save the visualization image

functions.name: compute_spatial_signature
functions.docstring:
Compute a spatial signature based on the distribution of points.
This is specialized for analyzing the distribution of celestial objects
and the void spaces between them.
